name: Lenna Crufts' Crypt Looter
description:
Our plucky, totally original explorer Lenna Crufts has made her latest big score, but what she didn't realise was that the crypt she was looting was a culturally ambiguous burial ground and/or cremation site! Help her get as many gold coins as possible before the ghosts get her!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to control Lenna.

This was my first gamedev project and it's awfully rough around the edges, I know, but for something that probably could've been done in a 12 hour game jam if I was faster, it's not too bad. I didn't get my pause screen and the music doesn't loop perfectly, but for a first project, I'm pretty proud.

Please do leave me feedback, it really would help me improve! This is the most fun I've had in a while and I'd love to get better.
